verbs.description: [ARG1: Kim] [V: is] [ARG2: about 5.8 feet tall , about 7.2 inches shorter than Trump] , [ARGM-ADV: according to media reports] . But when the two stood together during Tuesday ’s meeting , the difference in their heights was n’t that noticeable .

Kim is about 5.8 feet tall , about 7.2 inches shorter than Trump , [V: according] to media reports . But when the two stood together during Tuesday ’s meeting , the difference in their heights was n’t that noticeable .

Kim is about 5.8 feet tall , about 7.2 inches shorter than Trump , according to media reports . But [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG1: the two] [V: stood] [ARGM-PRD: together] [ARGM-TMP: during Tuesday ’s meeting] , the difference in their heights was n’t that noticeable .

Kim is about 5.8 feet tall , about 7.2 inches shorter than Trump , according to media reports . But [ARGM-TMP: when the two stood together during Tuesday ’s meeting] , [ARG1: the difference in their heights] [V: was] [ARGM-NEG: n’t] [ARG2: that noticeable] .
